column4: is there a way that I don't have to enter the passphrase for this sudo cryptsetup --key-file /dev/shm/password.txt luksOpen /dev/loop0 ; even when I give it the password it still wants me to type it
You mean so you don't have to constantly type the same passphrase for each partition?
opps wrong line this one sudo cryptsetup --key-file /dev/shm/password.txt luksFormat /dev/loop0
yes I never want to type the password it will come from an encrypted online source
